a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Road mortality rate, IHME vs. WHO data, 2019
Mortality rate from road injuries is measured per 100,000 people. Also shown is the line of parity (along which estimates are the same).
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019); World Health Organization (via World Bank)
